root.name: Deca Sports
root.description: Deca Sports is a sports title developed and published by Hudson Soft for the Wii. The game is very similar to Nintendo's Wii Sports. Deca Sports was released on May 13, 2008. Hudson even let players vote on the name of the game before it was released.Deca Sports features 10 different playable sports:Archery Badminton Basketball Volleyball Curling Figure skating Soccer Kart racing Snowboarding Supercross In August 2008, Hudson Soft announced that Deca Sports had shipped 700,000 copies worldwide.
